titleStmt.title: Annotations upon the five books immediately following the historicall part of the Old Testament (commonly called the five doctrinall or poeticall books) to wit, the book of Iob, the Psalms, the Proverbs, Ecclesiastes, and the Song of Solomon ... / by Arthur Jackson ...
titleStmt.author: Jackson, Arthur, 1593?-1666.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Roger Daniel, for the authour ...,

notesStmt.note: "Annotations upon the Book of Ecclesiastes" constitutes the 3rd part of: A help for the understanding of the Holy Scripture.
Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
